definition: sour-tasting liquid produced usually by oxidation of the alcohol in wine or cider and used as a condiment or food preservative
details:
noun
- sour-tasting liquid produced usually by oxidation of the alcohol in wine or cider and used as a condiment or food preservative
= synonyms: vinegar
- a dilute solution of acetic acid that is used as a solvent (e.g. for a drug)
